member.name: M:MyPayProject.TaxCalculator.CalculateResidentialTax(System.Double)
member.summary: takes a double of residental gross as an input, and generates different levels of Tax of residents
member.param: the double of residental gross to be used to generate the taxs
member.returns: different levels of tax of residents

member.name: M:MyPayProject.TaxCalculator.CalculateWorkingHolidayTax(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: takes a double of working holiday gross and double of yearToDate as inputs, and generates different levels of Tax of working hodiday staffs
member.param: the double of working holiday gross to be used to generate the taxs
takes the number of how much the working holiday staff been oaif during the financial year to be used to generate the taxs
member.returns: different levels of tax of working holiday taxs

member.name: M:MyPayProject.CsvLmporter.ImportPayRecords(System.String)
member.summary: Import pay information from a csv file and generate a list of PayRecord objects
member.param: path of the input csv file

member.name: M:MyPayProject.PayRecordWriter.write(System.Collections.Generic.List{MyPayProject.PayRecord},System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Write information from list of PayRecord objects to a csv file
member.param: Whether write to console or not
member.returns: file path of the csv file
